body.p: The amendments made in 2011 require entities to recognise all changes in the net defined benefit liability (asset) in the period in which those changes occur, and to disaggregate and recognise defined benefit cost as follows:

li.p: service cost, relating to the cost of the services received, in profit or loss.
net interest on the net defined benefit liability (asset), representing the financing effect of paying for the benefits in advance or in arrears, in profit or loss.
remeasurements, representing the period‑to‑period fluctuations in the amounts of defined benefit obligations and plan assets, in other comprehensive income.
